name: Oscii
description:
Description
A local multiplayer game where one oscillates and kills the other player. It features 24 seconds of soundtrack. Furthermore it features an incredibly impulsive computer player which only relies on the rand() function for thinking. It was made in one week (and one day) for a challenge. As if that was not enough there are hundreds of nearly identical players too choose from.

Known problems
It does sometimes crash when one player kills the other. On the windows version of the game sounds do not seem to work properly.

Tested hardware
It has been tested on a 64 bit windows system and a mac running osx yosemite.

It is best enjoyed with a friend, enjoy :)
